languages.text: {n}За тошнотворным хрустом следует чудовищная боль — огромные зубы всего на миг впиваются в вашу плоть, угрожая оттяпать всю кисть. Но, несмотря на количество крови, ваша рука на месте.{/n}
languages.translation_comment:
Пес кусает РТ
Снять хп
+1 на каунтер PetCybermastiff

Пес кусает РТ
Снять хп
+1 на каунтер PetCybermastiff

languages.text: {n}The sickening crunch is soon followed by searing pain. And yet, the huge teeth threatening to take your whole limb off sink only briefly into your flesh. Despite the copious amounts of blood, your hand remains in place.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}За тошнотворным хрустом следует чудовищная боль — огромные зубы всего на миг впиваются в вашу плоть, угрожая оттяпать всю кисть. Но, несмотря на количество крови, ваша рука на месте.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The sickening crunching sound is followed by horrible pain — the huge teeth sink into your flesh only briefly, threatening to take your whole hand off. But despite the amount of blood, your hand is still in place.{/n}

{n}The sickening crunching sound is followed by horrible pain — the huge teeth sink into your flesh only briefly, threatening to take your whole hand off. But despite the amount of blood, your hand is still in place.{/n}

{n}The sickening crunch is soon followed by searing pain. And yet, the huge teeth threatening to take your whole limb off sink only briefly into your flesh. Despite the copious amounts of blood, your hand remains in place.{/n}

{n}The sickening crunch is soon followed by searing pain. And yet, the huge teeth threatening to take your whole limb off sink only briefly into your flesh. Despite the copious amounts of blood, your hand remains in place.{/n}

languages.text: {n}不快な骨の砕ける音に続いて、焼けつくような激痛が襲った。だが、腕ごと持っていかれそうな巨大な牙は、ほんのわずかの間だけ肉に食い込んだだけだった。血は大量に流れているが、あなたの手は引きちぎられてはいない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sickening crunch is soon followed by searing pain. And yet, the huge teeth threatening to take your whole limb off sink only briefly into your flesh. Despite the copious amounts of blood, your hand remains in place.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}不快な骨の砕ける音に続いて、焼けつくような激痛が襲った。だが、腕ごと持っていかれそうな巨大な牙は、ほんのわずかの間だけ肉に食い込んだだけだった。血は大量に流れているが、あなたの手は引きちぎられてはいない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dem widerwärtigen Knacken folgt ein brennender Schmerz. Dennoch versinken die riesigen Zähne, die deinen ganzen Arm abbeißen könnten, nur kurz in deinem Fleisch. Trotz des beträchtlichen Blutverlusts bleibt deine Hand an ihrem Platz.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sickening crunch is soon followed by searing pain. And yet, the huge teeth threatening to take your whole limb off sink only briefly into your flesh. Despite the copious amounts of blood, your hand remains in place.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Dem widerwärtigen Knacken folgt ein brennender Schmerz. Dennoch versinken die riesigen Zähne, die deinen ganzen Arm abbeißen könnten, nur kurz in deinem Fleisch. Trotz des beträchtlichen Blutverlusts bleibt deine Hand an ihrem Platz.{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'ignoble craquement est rapidement suivi d'une douleur accablante. Pourtant, les immenses dents qui pourraient vous arracher le bras se contentent de se refermer brièvement sur votre chair. Votre sang jaillit à gros bouillons, mais votre main est toujours là.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sickening crunch is soon followed by searing pain. And yet, the huge teeth threatening to take your whole limb off sink only briefly into your flesh. Despite the copious amounts of blood, your hand remains in place.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'ignoble craquement est rapidement suivi d'une douleur accablante. Pourtant, les immenses dents qui pourraient vous arracher le bras se contentent de se refermer brièvement sur votre chair. Votre sang jaillit à gros bouillons, mais votre main est toujours là.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un escalofriante crujido precede a un dolor cegador. Y sin embargo, los enormes dientes que amenazan con arrancarte el brazo de cuajo solo se hunden en tu carne durante un breve instante. Pese a la abundante pérdida de sangre, aún conservas la mano.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sickening crunch is soon followed by searing pain. And yet, the huge teeth threatening to take your whole limb off sink only briefly into your flesh. Despite the copious amounts of blood, your hand remains in place.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un escalofriante crujido precede a un dolor cegador. Y sin embargo, los enormes dientes que amenazan con arrancarte el brazo de cuajo solo se hunden en tu carne durante un breve instante. Pese a la abundante pérdida de sangre, aún conservas la mano.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你听到了可怕的咯吱声，随后感觉到了灼热的刺痛。不过，尽管格雷托又大又尖的牙齿仿佛能把你整只手都扯下来，但它仅仅是咬了你一口就松开了。尽管你流了不少血，但手还在。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sickening crunch is soon followed by searing pain. And yet, the huge teeth threatening to take your whole limb off sink only briefly into your flesh. Despite the copious amounts of blood, your hand remains in place.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你听到了可怕的咯吱声，随后感觉到了灼热的刺痛。不过，尽管格雷托又大又尖的牙齿仿佛能把你整只手都扯下来，但它仅仅是咬了你一口就松开了。尽管你流了不少血，但手还在。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Mide bulandırıcı çıtırtının hemen ardından şiddetli bir acı hissediyorsun. Ancak tüm uzvunu koparabilecek kadar tehditkâr olan devasa dişler, kısa bir süreliğine etine batıyor. Boşalan kana rağmen elin olduğu yerde kalıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sickening crunch is soon followed by searing pain. And yet, the huge teeth threatening to take your whole limb off sink only briefly into your flesh. Despite the copious amounts of blood, your hand remains in place.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Mide bulandırıcı çıtırtının hemen ardından şiddetli bir acı hissediyorsun. Ancak tüm uzvunu koparabilecek kadar tehditkâr olan devasa dişler etine yalnızca kısa süreliğine batıyor. Boşalan kana rağmen elin olduğu yerde kalıyor.{/n}
